subcommands.name: cami-filter
subcommands.description: Remove taxa of given TaxIds and their descendants in CAMI metagenomic profile

options.description: No extra taxonomy data needed, so the original taxonomic information are used and not changed.
A mini taxonomic tree is built from records with abundance greater than zero, and only leaves are retained for later use. The rank of leaves may be "strain", "species", or "no rank".
Relative abundances (in percentage) are recomputed for all leaves (reference genome).
A new taxonomic tree is built from these leaves, and abundances are cumulatively added up from leaves to the root.
only consider leaves at these ranks (default [species,strain,no rank])
only show TaxIds and names of these ranks (default [superkingdom,phylum,class,order,family,genus,species,strain])

out file ("-" for stdout, suffix .gz for gzipped out) (default "-")
